snippet: A day after a woman died while waiting in line for new papers, Indonesian officials said they called on Saudi Arabia to extend the deadline for foreign workers without proper documents.
lead_paragraph: A day after a woman died while waiting in line for new papers, Indonesian officials said they called on Saudi Arabia to extend the deadline for foreign workers without proper documents.

headline.main: Indonesia: Officials Try to Aid Workers in Saudi Arabia
headline.print_headline: Indonesia: Officials Try to Aid Workers in Saudi Arabia
